lines.text: the black woman. Help me put an end... to the destruction of the young mind through the use of drugs, alcohol. Help me to build up a population of great thinkers. People who create change... through thoughtfulness and spirituality. Will you choose that truth? Will you? Will you choose the light over the darkness? Hold it, stay where you are. Will you choose life? It's time. It's time, man. It's time.
Yo, when's the last time you read anything, man?
Never, motherfucker.
Not only she know you but she said she sucked your little black dingaling last night! So what you got to say now huh?
Bitch is lyin!
Knowledge Born, What's the science baby?
Yo, did you not see that fucking red light, man?
Man, you think I give a fuck about a montherfucking red light? Faggot cops can't touch me. I'm out here smoking weed, speeding, all that, dawg. Fuck that. That's me. Untouchable.
Might have to drop 'em. Might have to drop a dime on them niggas

Once I found out the clock was ticking, it's get the glock, I'mma stick him, nah, kill 'em cause revenge is all a nigga think about in the end, but I'm goin' on a binge, brother, to my sins. Fuck y'all niggas. Born by myself, die by myself. Place the triggers. And if you don't know don't know what it's gon' be in the end... T minus 3, 2, 1... Amen.
What?
What the fuck you mean, what?
Come on with the bullshit, man. You think another motherfucker know what you need to do? Ain't no purpose, dawg. It's money. We born to fucking die, man. In the meantime, get money. Fuck a book, man.
What the fuck is wrong with this nigga? That's your man. That's your man.
When it rains, niggas get wet. You know? Dawg, you the only one I got in my corner, man. Don't cross me.
I got you.
One.
Who wants to romp with bumbaclot?
When you fuck with guns shorty, it's always the coolest niggaz who fuck around and get murdered.
See how big he is.
Without us, you go to jail. You go to jail forever.

I feel it's the only way. I don't feel a need to play the whole part in the entire movement. But, yo, if you just raise your family right, if I just live righteously, I be all right. Yo, my whole life is dedicated to change.
I don't like that shit. Don't like that shit one bit.
That's your word? Nigga suck my dick.
Jamaica is good.
Yeah, Jamaica is good. Jamaica is very good.
There's mad money out here dawg, mad money out here. What you tryin' to get it?
Word up
You gonna bust you gun to get it?
Tsh, whatever yo
I hear you...
